name: Playboy Men Casual Black Flip Flops
description:
Comfort and style rolled into one - that's playboy for you. Revel in the comfort of flip flops with this summery pair in black from Playboy.

Upper
Rubber thong straps that are smooth for absolute comfort
Textured on the upper with brand badge
Toe separator to hold the foot in place
Soft, cushioned rubber footbed with printed brand name and logo across the length of the right slipper footbed

Oustole
Single piece flexible and cushioned rubber footbed and outsole for all-day comfort
Bunny logo-styled lugs throughout the footbed for absolute grip and traction on various surfaces

Flip flop care
Wipe surface with a damp, clean cloth to remove dust

name: Puma Women Trinity Casual Shoes
description:
puma, a brand of German origin, is known for its high-end athletic footwear with simplistic designs. This pair of Trinity shoes from puma is a comfortable and stylish footwear choice. A pair of sneaker style shoes that does not conform, these shoes reflect the contemporary urge for individualism. Pair it with fitted denims and a T-shirt.

Upper
Fabric upper with check patterned overlays for dry comfort
Formstripe for shoe structure
Lacing system covering only the forefoot and an outer tongue
Soft, cushioned footbed for all-day comfort

Midsole
PU midsole for lightweight comfort

Outsole
TPU outsole with waffle patterned grooves for grip and traction

Shoe care
Wipe surface with soft, clean, damp cloth
Do not machine wash

name: Aurelia Women Black Printed Kurta
description:
Composition
Printed black and gold round neck kurta made of a blended fabric, has a split neckline, gold thread work on the yoke, three-quarter sleeves and a vented hem

Fit
Regular

Wash care
Wash dark colours separately
Do not bleach
Dry inside out in shade
Warm iron

The inspiration for this kurta from aurelia for women is the retro-esque fusion of the uniquely ethnic with smart workwear. The label combines the quirky street style of Indian metros with classic, time-perfected silhouettes. This piece epitomizes how fashion, vintage styling and comfort unite to create the perfect Indian tunic. Those interested in colour blocking can wear this with bright contrasting capris or pants. Others who want to keep their look classic and chic can pair this with tonal leggings, and embellished slippers.

The product is a size M on a model of height 5'8" and chest 33"

name: Converse Men Casual Navy Blue Flip Flops
description:
The classic flip flops has been dressed up by converse in a simple, understated and careless manner. Wear this pair with tonal denims and your favourite T-shirt to look casual without seeming overtly effortless.

Upper
Canvas upper with printed branding on the footbed
Canvas mounted on rubber thong straps
Fabric toe separator enclosed in transparent rubber casing

Outsole
Rubber outsole with waffle patterned lugs all over

slipper care
Make a paste using 1 tbsp of baking soda, 1 tbsp white vinegar and 1 tbsp hot water
Rub this paste onto the canvas and the sole using a brush
Wash off with lukewarm water

name: Converse Unisex Chuck Taylor All Stars New York Black Casual Shoes
description:
The Chuck Taylor All Star is a symbol of originality and self-expression the world over. The pioneers that put the lsquo;squeakrsquo; in Basketball have been an off-the-court favorite of rock stars and rebels for the past 60 years. Dedicated to basketball champ Chuck Taylor, this Chuck Taylor All-Star series from converse is also called Chucks, and comes in classic designs. Created using canvas and rubber, this range of sneakers from Converse was initially designed to capture the basketball market, but soon enough turned into a hot casual footwear favourite. Comes with a spare set of laces.

Upper
Canvas upper for easy maintenance and durability
Contrast lacing for maximum style
High ankle for extra support to the upper ankle and for style
Long canvas tongue for added comfort and snug Fit
Lace-ups through metal eyelets for snug fit and durability
Eyelets on the lateral side for ventilation

Midsole
Comfort insole made of contoured latex foam for high energy return and cushioning

Outsole
Vulcanized rubber outsole for flexibility and traction
Diamond-shaped lugs on the forefoot and heel, with horizontal lugs and grooves on the toe region and heel region, and slanting grooves along the periphery and midfoot for superior grip on all terrains

shoe care
 Make a paste using 1 tbsp of baking soda, 1 tbsp white vinegar and 1 tbsp hot water
Rub this paste onto the canvas and the sole using a brush
Wash off with lukewarm water


Warranty provided by the brand owner / manufacturer

name: Converse Unisex Black Casual Shoes
description:
converse's reinterpretation of the classic boat shoe is perfect for a warm-weather cool, especially for the tropics. This nautical-inspired piece adds an interesting dimension to your off-duty staples. Style this sockless with rolled up denims, a T-shirt and a fedora or with tailored shorts, an understated belt and a shirt for a dressed-down vibe.

Upper
Canvas upper for easy maintenance and durability
Canvas tongue for added comfort and snug Fit
Two-hole criss-crossing lace ups
Lace detail on the sides of the mouth
Stitch detail on the seams of the toe box

Midsole
PU midsole for impact protection

Outsole
Rubber outsole with waffle patterned grooves on the forefoot and midfoot
Diagonal patterning all over

Shoe care
Make a paste using 1 tbsp of baking soda, 1 tbsp white vinegar and 1 tbsp hot water
Rub this paste onto the canvas and the sole using a brush
Wash off with lukewarm water

 Make a paste using 1 tbsp of baking soda, 1 tbsp white vinegar and 1 tbsp hot water

Wash off with lukewarm water

Do not machine wash or store in direct sunlight

name: Nike Men Zoom Vomero Sports Shoes
description:
Perfect for underpronators and runners with a natural gait, the nike Zoom Vomero+ 6 has lightweight cushioning as its predecessors, but with a better Fit and support. With a Gender specific midfoot and elasticated mesh panels that lock the foot in place, it supports all phases of your run. Being a nike+ range shoe, you can add on to it compatible iPod nanos, Sports watches, sport bands and others from the Nike+ range and clock your runs, calories, track your routes and much more.

Upper
Heavily meshed upper with elasticated mesh panels on the forefoot and mouth, and fixed panels on the sides and backfoot for maximum ventilation and to lock the fit in place to create an adaptable fit
Synthetic overlays with swoosh branding on the sides for shoe structure
Padded sockliner for in-step comfort
Lace-up system with cushioned tongue for snug fit
Mesh inner sleeve that wraps around the entire foot for a plush, comfortable fit
Reflective elements for safe running even in low light conditions

Midsole
Nike Zoom units in the forefoot and heel for responsive cushioning
Full length Cushlon midsole for lightweight comfort, impact protection and durability

Outsole
Blown Rubber outsole with BRS 1000 crash pad in the heel for efficient stride and maximum cushioning
Multiple rubber and traction patterns offering a smooth stride
Gender specific flex grooves for improved flexibility and a more natural range of motion offering a seamless heel to toe transition
Transparent trusstic unit in the medial arch with extra support to stabilize the foot and allow natural motion, especially to underpronators

Shoe care
Do not machine wash
Remove dust and dirt with dry clean cloth

name: Numero Uno Men Casual Shoes
description:
These numero uno sneakers with sturdy soles, bold stitch detailing and aggressive design highlights is a closet essential. Rough up your ensemble with this sleek referenced sneaker. Wear them with fitted denims and a tee. Throw on a tonal jacket for added style.

Upper
Textured synthetic leather upper for durability, comfort and style
Stitched synthetic overlays for midfoot support
Lace-up system for snug, customised Fit
Synthetic leather tongue for midfoot comfort
Printed branding on tongue for style
Perforations on the toe for ventilation

Midsole
PU midsole for lightweight, cushioned comfort
Padded footbed for all-day comfort

Outsole
Durable rubber outsole in terraced groove pattern for maximum traction and grip

shoe care
Wipe surface with soft, clean, cloth or brush, cold water and mild detergent to remove dust
Do not machine wash or use a drier
Avoid storing shoes in extremely hot conditions or in direct sunlight

name: Quiksilver Men High Socks
description:
It's comfort unparalleled once you slip into this pair of mid-calf high socks from quiksilver. Crafted from soft, stretchable fabric, these socks have been designed for the confident executive.

Made of a 80% cotton, 18% polyamide and 2% elastane
Padded footbed for cushioned comfort
Seamless stitch for abrasion-free wear
Rib knit slim cuff for a comfortable wear
Roomy toe area for superior comfort and durability
Branding text and logo on the foot region

Sock care
Wash inside out
Wash dark colours separately
Do not iron, dry clean or tumble dry
Dry in shade

name: Converse Unisex CT Oxford Ox Casual Shoes
description:
Dedicated to Basketball champ Chuck Taylor, this Chuck Taylor All-Star series from converse are also called Chucks and comes in classic designs. Created using canvas and rubber, this range of sneakers from Converse were initially designed to capture the basketball market, but soon enough turned into hot casual footwear favourites.

Upper
Canvas upper for easy maintenance and durability
Carbon rubber toe box for enhanced protection of the upper foot
Long canvas tongue for added comfort and snug Fit
Synthetic twill lace running through metallic eyelets for durability and snug fit

Midsole
Cushioned fabric footbed for comfort and breathable comfort
Comfort insole for all-day easy wear

Outsole
Reinforced guard to protect the forefoot of the shoe and enhance durability
Vulcanized rubber outsole for flexibility and traction
Waffle pattern outsole for superior grip on all terrains

Shoe care
Make a paste using 1 tbsp of baking soda, 1 tbsp white vinegar and 1 tbsp hot water
Rub this paste onto the canvas and the sole using a brush
Wash off with lukewarm water

name: Converse Men Oxford Navy Blue Casual Shoes
description:
Monochrome CT Oxford, as its name implies, references the conservative formal shoe. converse adds its trademark youthful twist to the piece. Neat silhouetting and simple design details on this shoe rank it high in this season's minimalist trend. Wear this with a vibrant T-shirt and let your inner fashionista free while adding other pieces to this ensemble. Comes with a spare pair of laces.

Upper
Canvas upper for easy maintenance and durability
Long canvas tongue for added comfort and snug Fit
Four-hole synthetic twill lace running through metallic eyelets for durability and snug fit

Midsole
PU midsole for impact protection

Outsole
Rubber outsole with waffle patterned grooves on the forefoot and midfoot
Diagonal patterning all over

Shoe care
Make a paste using 1 tbsp of baking soda, 1 tbsp white vinegar and 1 tbsp hot water
Rub this paste onto the canvas and the sole using a brush
Wash off with lukewarm water

name: Converse Men Black Tongue Triple Colour Shoes
description:
These low top shoes are inspired by converse's lucky charm Chuck Taylor - Basketball player turned salesman. Iconic and synonymous with style and youth culture, these shoes reflect a fusion of sport and style. Wear this with form fitting denims, a monochrome tee and a casual jacket.

Upper
Canvas upper with stitch detailing for shoe structure
Central lacing system with a long tongue for comfort
Rubber overlay on the toe box to protect the toe region
Reinforced overlay at the heel region for good shoe structure
Metal eyelets on the midfoot for ventilation

Midsole
PU midsole with branding on the heel and PU foxing on the toe region

Outsole
Rubber outsole with terraced grooves and patterned lugs

Shoe care
Make a paste using 1 tbsp of baking soda, 1 tbsp white vinegar and 1 tbsp hot water
Rub this paste onto the canvas and the sole using a brush
Wash off with lukewarm water

name: Converse Unisex Blue Casual Shoes
description:
denim upper on the AS Canvas OX stays true to converses love for all things young and contemporary. Denim never goes out of style and the hard wearing fabric is perfect for all-year use. Style this with tonal denim pants and a T-shirt or casual shirt.

Upper
Denim upper for easy maintenance and durability
Rubber toe box for enhanced protection of the upper foot
Long denim tongue for added comfort and snug Fit
Central lace ups with metal eyelets

Midsole
PU midsole with textured foxing at the toe box

Outsole
Rubber outsole with waffle patterned grooves on the forefoot and midfoot
Diagonal patterning all over

shoe care
Make a paste using 1 tbsp of baking soda, 1 tbsp white vinegar and 1 tbsp hot water
Rub this paste onto the canvas and the sole using a brush
Wash off with lukewarm water


Warranty provided by the brand owner / manufacturer

name: ADIDAS Unisex Casual Backpack
description:
Fun, style and comfort are the highlights of this black backpack from adidas. Carry it to college or on a casual day out with your friends. A good looking bag with lots of space, it is sure to accommodate everything you think of.

Measurement
Height: 16"
Width: 12"
Depth: 7"

Made of nylon for enhanced durability
Two roomy compartments with a detailed organizer and an inner zippered compartment
Brand name with the adidas three patented stripes printed on the front
Haul loop for handling ease
Two mesh bottle holders on either side
Side adjustable straps with a click clasp to customise size
Padded, adjustable shoulder straps that distribute weight evenly and protect the shoulders and back from injuries
Ergonomic design to Fit along the torso comfortably
Branded zippers and sliders for easy use
Nylon bonded thread for long life

Care
Rub surface with dry clean cloth to remove dust and dirt

Streamlined for a more powerful, more comfortable stride, these adidas Supernova&trade Sequence 4 shoes step you into an anatomical GEOFIT&trade construction and a breathable air mesh upper. These running shoes also protect your joints with impact-absorbent adiPRENE® cushioning and TORSION® midfoot support and their perfect for overpronators.

Upper
Mesh uppers with reflective synthetic overlays for excellent ventilation and high-visibility when running in low light conditions
Anatomical Geofit construction for greater comfort
adidas patented 3-Stripe design on the sides for enhanced support and to exude the brand&rsquo s belief in performance
Lace-ups for snug Fit
Mesh tongue for greater breathability
Cushioned collar for greater comfort
Brand name embossed on the tongue and on the heel

Midsole
OrthoLite® performance insoles giving 'comfort from the inside out' that can be replaced with a medical orthotic
Insole wicks away moisture, inhibits odour and fungus and ensures air flow to keep your feet cool
adiPRENE® in the forefoot maintains propulsion and efficiency

Outsole
FORMOTION technology on the outsole adapts to the ground to ensure the smoothest, most comfortable run possible
adiPRENE® under the heel with a scooped out cavity gives superior cushioning on impact
Combination of blown rubber and sticky rubber for exceptional grip in high-impact areas
Updated Torsion System TPU for a smooth midfoot transition with increased midfoot integrity
Flex grooves provide greater flexibility to the feet

miCoach Compatible

shoe care
Wipe surface with damp, clean cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash or store in direct sunlight

description:
Designed for those want a shoe to support their foot and make sure they are getting the best performance during those healthy morning runs, the AdiStar Salvation 3 combines lightweight comfort and ease of wear that makes running all the more pleasurable. adidas have used their own Formotion technology which means your shoe will adapt to the ground every step of the way.

Upper
Suede and mesh upper for maximum breathable comfort and style
adidas Patented 3-Stripes in reflective silver plus reflective features on the midfoot for enhanced shoe structure and style
Meshed and padded collar and tongue with fabric inner for all-day snug comfort
Lace-up system for a snug, customised Fit
OrthoLite® performance insoles giving 'comfort from the inside out' that can be replaced with a medical orthotic
Insole wicks away moisture, inhibits odour and fungus and ensures air flow to keep your feet cool

Midsole
AdiPrene midsole for an absolutely cushioned ride, lightweight comfort and enhanced impact protection
Heel stabilizer in the heel for absolute impact protection for the backfoot and ankles
TORSION midfoot

Outsole
Durable Continental rubber outsole with flex grooves and lugs for absolute grip and traction
Formotion heel for total shock absorption and support
3D Pro-Moderator on inner side to counterbalance over-pronation

miCoach Compatible

Shoe care
Wipe surface with a damp, clean cloth to remove dust and dirt
Do not wash or store in direct sunlight

name: Crocs Men Yukon Sandals
description:
Originally designed for boaters and fishermen to have a firm foot even on slippery surfaces, crocs has gone a long way in creating footwear for those who demand comfort to the T. Replete with several benefits such as the shoe moulding to your feet using your body heat, it's a hot favourite.

The speciality of these shoes are that they need to Fit loosely around the feet,  and that neither the sides of the shoe nor the toe unit come in contact with the feet. Instead, there should be a quarter to half inch gap between the foot and the wall of the shoe, and you should be able to comfortably fit a finger between the heel and back strap.

Upper
EVA upper with leather over the mid-foot area that is textured inside for lightweight feel, comfort and durability
EVA material that moulds to the foot shape offering ample ergonomic comfort
Perforations on the forefoot for ventilation, to drain away water and to add jibbitz
Adjustable back strap with a velcro closure to support the ankle and hold the foot in place
Upper moulded to mid-sole for comfort and protection of feet from abrasion
Broad EVA lining along the mid-sole for enhanced durability
Brand button for style
EVA foot-bed with ergonomically designed lines for comfort and acupressure
Fungus, bacteria and odour resistant upper for a healthy wear even in wet conditions
Heel cup for added support

Out-sole
Slip resistant out-sole with multi-directional textured leaf-shaped grooves in the forefoot and back foot

Shoe care
Wipe surface with clean, damp cloth to remove dust

A great addition to any sophisticated man's wardrobe, it can add tons of character to your outfit in an instant.

name: Esprit Women Vital Crystal Rose Black Watch
description:
Taking traditional designs and giving it a modern twist is what makes esprit watches timeless timepieces. This Crystal Rose analog wrist watch is no exception. Contemporary and trendy, it& rsquo s an affordable timepiece with an exquisite design that highlights your individuality.

Case diameter: 21 mm
Case thickness: 7 mm
Dial shape: Round

Durable, scratch-resistant mineral crystal glass
Orange dial with brand name
Quartz movement of time display
Screw to reset time

Water resistant up to 50 m, allowing you to use it when washing hands and your car

name: Esprit Men Casual Black Watch
description:
Classic and glitz make a wonderful combination in this black dial, large face multi-function watch. It transitions perfectly from day to night. This new range of watches are a fresh take on the esprit eye for perfection and are great for urban wear.

Case diameter: 45 mm
Case thickness: 10 mm
Dial shape: Round
Warranty: 2 years

Logo at the 6-hour mark

Date aperture at the 4-hour mark
Polished hands mark sub dials
Screw to reset time

Water resistance up to 100 meters, wearable around sinks, during swimming
Comes with authentic collectible tin

name: Mother Earth Women Magenta Printed Kurta
description:
Composition
Magenta printed V-neck kurta made of blended cotton fabric, has a half buttoned placket, short sleeves and a vented hem

Fit
Regular

Wash care
 Hand wash separately in cold water using a mild detergent as colour may bleed
Flat dry inside out in shade
Warm iron

The inspiration for this kurta from mother earth is the retro-esque fusion of ethnic apparel and smart workwear. This piece epitomizes how fashion, vintage styling and comfort unite to create the perfect Indian tunic. Mother Earth uses hand processed fabrics including natural and Azo free dyes. Woven with slub yarns for an authentic vintage feel. Those interested in colour blocking can wear this with bright contrasting capris or pants. Others, who want to keep their look classic and chic, can pair this with tonal leggings, and embellished slippers.

Model statistics
 The product is a size S on a model of height 5'8" and chest 33"

name: Skechers Men Masterson Sports Shoes
description:
Run less, get more with the skechers Radius Trainer. Fab to look at and a great gift for the feet, this pair of running shoes is designed with the best of technologies to offer absolute comfort and health quicker. The Kinetic Wedge Technology in this shoe intensifies training and burns more calories with each step, delivering a great cardio workout with ease.


You get an extra pair of laces in a contrast colour and a DVD on the shoe and how to maximise the technologies for your benefit.

Upper
Meshed synthetic upper with strategically placed synthetic overlays for absolute durability, lightweight and mesh for breathable comfort
Padded and meshed collar and tongue for in-step comfort
Lace-up system for a snug, customised Fit

Midsole
Two-part firm and soft-density midsole that delivers a rocking effect from the heel to the toe, creating a natural instability and activating lesser used muscles, reducing the stress on joints and the back
Anti-microbial form-fitting footbed to wick sweat away and prevent odour, and also increase breathability
Removable footbed to accommodate an orthotic
Roll bridge using reinforced heel pillars to improve side-to-side stability and control forward motion
Ultra-soft Resamax Kinetic Wedge Technology extending from the heel to toe, offering a gradual transition with each stride. The softer lower layer of the Resamax provides superior cushioning and creates natural instability, toning the muscles and adjusting the body for proper balance and positioning

Outsole
Curved rocker bottom design for smoother heel-strike to toe-off transition, helping you run in a more natural state
Made of durable high abrasion rubber treads for enhanced cushioning and maximum traction

Shoe care
Wipe surface with a dry, clean cloth to remove dust
Do not store in direct sunlight

name: Inc.5 Women Metallic Heels
description:
It's femininity celebrated and enhanced with this pair of heeled sandals from Inc. 5. With it's sleek design and simple style, this pair works great both as an office wear and for parties.

This pair comes with a shoe bag that helps you carry it around in ease.

Heel: 3"

Upper
Suede footbed with a synthetic leather patch on the mid-length of the foot, and has a padded heel for absolute comfort and style
Synthetic leather forefoot and back heel straps, with an elasticated band running along the lateral ankle to the medial toe mound to offer a customised Fit in style

Outsole
Non-slip outsole with grooves and footwear design lugs on the forefoot
Textured rubber heel base for absolute grip even on smooth surfaces

Sandal care
Wipe surface with a damp, clean cloth to remove dust and dirt
Do not wash or store in direct sunlight
